title: Facebook failed to warn users of known risks before 2018 breach: court filing
text: Facebook  users suing the world's largest social media network over a 2018 data breach say it failed to warn them about risks tied to its single sign-on tool, even though it protected its employees, a court filing on Thursday showed.

title: 5 Tech Stocks That Are In Trouble Right Now
text: Tech stocks that were once darlings on Wall Street have become some of the hottest stocks to sell now as investors grow increasingly worried.

title: Senator challenges Zuckerberg testimony as 'at best, incomplete' after Facebook audio report
text: Sen. Gary Peters asked Facebook's CEO to respond to questions about the firm's audio collection practices and cast doubt on his testimony.

title: How Facebook does IT
text: If you have ever worked at any sizable company, the word “IT” probably doesn’t conjure up many warm feelings. If you’re working for an old, traditional enterprise company, you probably don’t expect anything else, though.

title: The Uncertainty Is Gone. Facebook Is A Buy
text: Facebook continues to drive user growth across all platforms. Facebook grew faster than all the other FAANG+M stocks in Q2. Future catalysts point towards continued growth for Facebook.

title: Facebook's Growth Reaccelerates but the Stock Drops. Time to Buy?
text: Don’t overlook the currently unloved social media leader after its Q2 2019 sell-off.
